firstAbility.name: Crescent Strike
firstAbility.description:
Diana unleashes a bolt of lunar energy that travels in a counter-clockwise arc before exploding at the target location, 
granting sight of the area for 0.5 seconds and dealing magic damage to enemies hit and afflicting them with Moonlight for 3 seconds, during which they are

secondAbility.name: Pale Cascade
secondAbility.description:
Diana grants herself a shield for up to 5 seconds and creates three spheres that orbit her for the same duration, 
detonating upon contact with an enemy to deal magic damage to nearby enemies.

thirdAbility.name: Lunar Rush
thirdAbility.description:
Diana dashes dashes to the target enemy's location, and upon completion, she deals them magic damage and consumes Moonlight Moonlight from all enemies. 
If the target is within 400 range, Diana will dash through their location.

fourthAbility.name: Moonfall
fourthAbility.description: Diana pulls in all nearby enemies, during which they are revealed, then slows them for 2 seconds.

passiveAbility.name: Moonsilver Blade
passiveAbility.description:
Diana basic attacks generate a stack of Moonsilver Blade for 3.5 seconds, refreshing on subsequent attacks and stacking up to 2 times. 
At 2 stacks, Diana empowers her next basic attack to consume the stacks on-hit to additionally cleave nearby enemies, dealing them 20 − 220 (based on level)

firstAbility.name: Mistral Bolt
firstAbility.description: Vex launches a wave of mist in the target direction that deals magic damage to enemies hit. After travelling 500 units, the wave accelerates but also narrows itself.

secondAbility.name: Personal Space
secondAbility.description: Vex emits a shockwave around her before the cast time, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies and granting herself a Hybrid resistances shield for 2.5 seconds.

thirdAbility.name: Looming Darkness
thirdAbility.description: Vex tosses her Shadow to explode at the target location, dealing magic damage to enemies hit and slowing them for 2 seconds. The explosion's radius increases based on cast distance.

fourthAbility.name: Shadow Surge
fourthAbility.description: Vex sends her Shadow in the target direction that grants sight around its trajectory and deals magic damage to enemies hit.

passiveAbility.name: Doom 'n Gloom
passiveAbility.description:
Periodically, Vex empowers her next basic ability to knock down and Flee icon.png fear enemies hit for 0.75 / 1 / 1.25 / 1.5 (based on level) seconds, during which they are slowed by 60% − 99% (based on distance from Vex). 
If Looming Darkness triggers Doom, enemies hit will flee from the epicenter instead. Doom's cooldown resets upon respawning.

firstAbility.name: Arcanopulse
firstAbility.description: Charges while being slowed by 0% − 40% (based on channel time) for up to 3 seconds to increase Arcanopulse's range over the first 1.5 to 1.75 seconds of the channel.

secondAbility.name: Eye of Destruction
secondAbility.description:
casts down a blast of arcane energy that strikes the target location after 0.528 seconds, 
briefly granting sight of the area and dealing magic damage to enemies hit and slowing them by 25% for 2.5 seconds.

thirdAbility.name: Shocking Orb
thirdAbility.description: Fires an orb of energy in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first enemy hit and stuns them for 0.75 − 2.25 (based on orb travel distance) seconds.

fourthAbility.name: Rite of the Arcane
fourthAbility.description:
Channels for up to 10 seconds, gaining the ability to recast Rite of the Arcane multiple times after 0.5 seconds within the duration. 
If Rite of the Arcane ends without any of the recasts being used, half of its cooldown is refunded.

passiveAbility.name: Mana Surge
passiveAbility.description: Xerath empowers his next basic attack to restore 30 − 195 (based on level) mana, doubled to 60 − 390 (based on level) against enemy champions.

firstAbility.name: Hate Spike
firstAbility.description: Launches a dart in the target direction, dealing magic damage to the first enemy hit and marking them for 4 seconds.

secondAbility.name: Allure
secondAbility.description: Curses the target enemy champion or monster for 5 seconds.

thirdAbility.name: Whiplash
thirdAbility.description: Whips the target enemy with her lashers, dealing magic damage and applying on-hit effects at 100% effectiveness.

fourthAbility.name: Last Caress
fourthAbility.description: Reveals her true form, becoming untargetable at the start of the cast time and then unleashing her lashers in a cone in the target direction, dealing magic damage to enemies struck within.

passiveAbility.name: Demon Shade
passiveAbility.description: Shrouds herself in Demon Shade after not performing actions that break stealth for 4 seconds.

firstAbility.name: Ice Shard
firstAbility.description: launches a shard of ice in the target direction that deals magic damage to enemies hit. The first target hit is slowed for 1.5 seconds

secondAbility.name: Ring of Frost
secondAbility.description: Lissandra freezes nearby enemies, dealing magic damage and rooting them for a duration.

thirdAbility.name: Glacial Path
thirdAbility.description:
Lissandra sends a claw of ice in the target direction that deals magic damage to enemies it passes through, 
decelerating over 1.25 seconds. Glacial Path can be recast after 0.5 seconds while the claw is active.

fourthAbility.name: Frozen Tomb
fourthAbility.description: Lissandra freezes the target enemy champion, knocking them down and stunning them for 1.5 seconds.

passiveAbility.name: Iceborn Subjugation
passiveAbility.description: Whenever a nearby enemy champion dies, Lissandra spawns a Frozen Thrall from their corpse.

firstAbility.name: Disintegrate
firstAbility.description: Annie hurls a fireball at the target enemy that deals magic damage.

secondAbility.name: Incinerate
secondAbility.description: Annie releases fire in a cone in the target direction, dealing magic damage to enemies hit.

thirdAbility.name: Molten Shield
thirdAbility.description: Annie grants herself or the target allied champion and Tibbers a shield for 3 seconds and 20% − 50% (based on level) bonus movement speed that decays over 1.5 seconds.

fourthAbility.name: Summon: Tibbers
fourthAbility.description: Annie summons Tibbers to the target location in a burst of flame, dealing magic damage to enemies near him. Summon: Tibbers can be recast at any time while Tibbers is alive.

passiveAbility.name: Pyromania
passiveAbility.description: Annie generates a stack of Pyromania whenever she hits an enemy with Disintegrate Disintegrate or casts her other abilities, stacking up to 4 times, at which she gains Energized.

firstAbility.name: Overload
firstAbility.description: Ryze's other basic ability casts reset Overload's cooldown and charge a Rune stack for 4 seconds, refreshing on subsequent casts and stacking up to 2 times.

secondAbility.name: Rune Prison
secondAbility.description: Ryze seizes the target enemy, dealing magic damage and slowing them by 35% for 1.5 seconds.

thirdAbility.name: Spell Flux
thirdAbility.description: Ryze projects an orb upon the target enemy that deals magic damage.

fourthAbility.name: Realm Warp
fourthAbility.description:
Channels for 2 seconds to open a portal beneath him, marking the target location as its destination and gaining sight of the area. 
Ryze is able to act while channeling, but the portal will cancel if he is interrupted

passiveAbility.name: Arcane Mastery
passiveAbility.description: Ryze increases his maximum mana by (6% per 100 AP).

firstAbility.name: Orb of Deception
firstAbility.description: sends her orb in the target direction that deals magic damage to enemies hit. At maximum range, the orb homes back to her to deal the same in Hybrid penetration to enemies hit.

secondAbility.name: Fox-Fire
secondAbility.description: Ahri gains 40% bonus movement speed that decays over 2 seconds and conjures three flames which orbit her clockwise for up to 2.5 seconds

thirdAbility.name: Charm
thirdAbility.description: Ahri blows forth a kiss in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first enemy hit, knocking them down and charming and slowing them by 65% for a duration.

fourthAbility.name: Widmowa Szarża
fourthAbility.description: Ahri dashes to the target location and then fires essence bolts to up to 3 nearby visible enemies, each dealing magic damage.

passiveAbility.name: Essence Theft
passiveAbility.description: Ahri generates a stack of Essence Fragment whenever she kills a minion or monster. At 9 stacks, she consumes them to heal herself for 35 − 95 (based on level) (+ 20% AP).

firstAbility.name: Baleful Strike
firstAbility.description: Veigar blasts a dark bolt in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first two enemies hit.

secondAbility.name: Dark Matter
secondAbility.description: casts down a mass of dark matter that strikes the target location after a 1.221 seconds delay, dealing magic damage to enemies hit.

thirdAbility.name: Event Horizon
thirdAbility.description:
Veigar forms a cage at the target location that erects after a 0.5 second delay, remaining there for 3 seconds. 
Enemies that collide with the edges of the cage are knocked down and stunned for a duration.

fourthAbility.name: Primordial Burst
fourthAbility.description: Veigar sends a primordial burst at the target enemy champion that deals magic damage, increased by 0% − 100% (based on target's missing health).

passiveAbility.name: Phenomenal Evil Power
passiveAbility.description: Veigar generates a stack of Phenomenal Evil for each enemy champion hit by his abilities, and 5 stacks whenever he scores an enemy champion takedown.

firstAbility.name: Command: Attack
firstAbility.description:
Orianna commands The Ball to fly to the target location and remain there, 
dealing magic damage to enemies it passes through and nearby enemies upon arrival, reduced to 70% against those hit beyond the first.

secondAbility.name: Command: Dissonance
secondAbility.description: Orianna commands The Ball to emit an electric pulse that deals magic damage to nearby enemies.

thirdAbility.name: Command: Protect
thirdAbility.description:
Orianna commands The Ball to fly to herself or the target allied champion and attach itself to the target, 
dealing magic damage to enemies it passes through and granting the target a shield for 2.5 seconds upon arrival.

fourthAbility.name: Command: Shockwave
fourthAbility.description: commands The Ball to unleash a shockwave that deals magic damage to nearby enemies, stunning them for 0.75 seconds, and pulling them over 325 − 700 (based on proximity to ball) units, though not through terrain.

passiveAbility.name: Clockwork Windup
passiveAbility.description:
Orianna is accompanied by The Ball, which she commands with her abilities. 
The Ball incurs a 0.15-second global cooldown on all of her abilities between casts. Additionally, The Ball attaches to Orianna if she is near it, 
and snaps back to her if she moves too far away from it, which incurs a 0.5-second global cooldown on all of her abilities.

firstAbility.name: Null Sphere
firstAbility.description: fires an orb of void energy at the target enemy that deals magic damage and disrupts their ongoing channels.

secondAbility.name: Nether Blade
secondAbility.description:
Kassadin empowers his next basic attack within 5 seconds to have an uncancellable windup, gain 50 bonus range, 
deal increased bonus magic damage, and restore mana, with the restoration amount quintupled against champions.

thirdAbility.name: Force Pulse
thirdAbility.description: Kassadin emits a pulse of void energy in a cone in the target direction that deals magic damage to enemies hit and slows them for 1 second.

fourthAbility.name: Riftwalk
fourthAbility.description:
Kassadin blinks toward the target location, dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies upon arrival. 
He then gains a stack of Riftwalk for 5 seconds, refreshing on subsequent casts and stacking up to 4 times.

passiveAbility.name: Void Stone
passiveAbility.description: Kassadin is permanently ghosted and takes 10% reduced magic damage.

firstAbility.name: Flash Frost
firstAbility.description:
Anivia launches a chunk of ice in the target direction that deals magic damage to enemies 
hit and slows them by 20% − 40% (based on Glacial Storm's Rank) for 3 seconds.

secondAbility.name: Crystallize
secondAbility.description:
Anivia summons a wall of ice at the target location perpendicular to her facing, 
knocking all units away from it, though not through terrain. The wall lingers as impassable terrain for 5 seconds.

thirdAbility.name: Frostbite
thirdAbility.description: Enemies hit by Flash Frost or a fully formed Glacial Storm become Chilled for 3 seconds, refreshing on subsequent hits.

fourthAbility.name: Glacial Storm
fourthAbility.description:
Anivia calls forth a driving rain of ice and hail at the target location, dealing magic damage every 0.5 seconds 
to enemies within and slowing them for 1 second, refreshing every 0.5 seconds while they remain inside.

passiveAbility.name: Rebirth
passiveAbility.description: Periodically, upon taking fatal damage, Anivia enters resurrection for 6 seconds and restores all of her health.

itemy.name: hextech rocketbelt
itemy.passive: SUPERSONIC: Dash 125 to 275 units in the target direction, though not through terrain, unleashing an arc of 7 rockets in the same direction that deal 125 (+ 15% AP) magic damage to enemies hit.

itemy.name: rylai crystal scepter
itemy.passive: Dealing ability damage slows affected units by 30% for 1 second.

itemy.name: crown of the shattered queen
itemy.passive: Become Safeguarded to reduce incoming champion damage by 75%, lingering for 1.5 seconds after taking damage from a champion (40 (restarts upon taking damage from champions) second cooldown).

itemy.name: everfrost
itemy.passive: Unleash a fan of icy shards in a cone in the target direction, dealing 100 (+ 30% AP) magic damage to enemies struck within and slowing them by 65% for 1 second.

itemy.name: archangel staff
itemy.passive: Transforms into Seraph's Embrace at 360 bonus mana.

itemy.name: zhonya hourglass
itemy.passive:
Put yourself in stasis for 2.5 seconds, rendering you untargetable and invulnerable for the duration but also unable to move, 
declare basic attacks, cast abilities, use summoner spells, or activate items (120 second cooldown).

itemy.name: morello
itemy.passive: Dealing magic damage to enemy champions inflicts them with Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.

itemy.name: horizon focus
itemy.passive:
Dealing ability damage to a champion with an ability that is neither unit-targeted nor auto-targeted at more than 700 units away
 or slowing, immobilizing or polymorphing them reveals them and increases your damage dealt to them by 10% for 6 seconds

itemy.name: demonic embrace
itemy.passive: Dealing ability damage curses enemies, causing them to take「 (Melee 6.4% / Ranged 4%) of their maximum health as total magic damage over 4 seconds, capped at 400 against monsters.

itemy.name: night harvester
itemy.passive:
Damaging an enemy champion deals 125 (+ 15% AP) bonus magic damage and grants you 25% bonus movement speed for 1.5 seconds, 
with the duration extending on subsequent triggers (30 (per champion) second cooldown).

itemy.name: riftmaker
itemy.passive:
For each second in combat with champions, deal 3% increased damage, stacking up to 3 times for a maximum of 9%. 
While this effect is fully stacked, convert 100% of the increased damage into true damage.

itemy.name: blasting wand
itemy.passive: Zwykle różdzka

itemy.name: boots of swiftness
itemy.passive: Gain 25% Tenacity

itemy.name: ionian boots of lucidity
itemy.passive: Gain 12CD

itemy.name: boots of mobility
itemy.passive: Gain additional 125 movement speed if you weren't in fight for 5 seconds

itemy.name: ninja tabi
itemy.passive: Decrease damage from autoattacks by 12%

itemy.name: sorcerer shoes
itemy.passive: Increase magic penetration

itemy.name: berserker greaves
itemy.passive: Increase attack speed

itemy.name: shadowflame
itemy.passive: Dealing magic damage to champions ignores 10 − 20 (based on target's current health) of their magic resistance.

itemy.name: cosmic drive
itemy.passive:
After dealing 3 instances of damage from basic attacks or ability damage to champions within 3 seconds, 
gain 15% bonus movement speed, decaying to 5% over 2 seconds, and 40 ability power for 5 seconds, refreshing on damage dealt to champions though not resetting the effect.

itemy.name: luden tempest
itemy.passive: Dealing ability damage to an enemy deals 100 (+ 10% AP) additional magic damage to them and launches orbs at up to 3 other enemies

itemy.name: infinity edge
itemy.passive: Gain 35% bonus critical strike damage if you have at least 40% critical strike chance.

itemy.name: banshee veil
itemy.passive: Grants a spell shield that blocks the next hostile ability (40 (restarts upon taking damage from champions) second cooldown).
